item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Saturday, March 15, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC

8. did u ever read so hard u accidentally wrote? (20 points | 2 comments)

10. SICL: Fresh Implementation of Common Lisp (6 points | 1 comment)

12. Shellcode Encoded in UUIDs (9 points | no comments)

15. Ruby Debugging Tips and Recommendations in 2025 (7 points | no comments)

22. Enhancing CA Practices: Key Updates in Mozilla Root Store Policy, v3.0 (11 points | 4 comments)
23. Recursion kills: The story behind CVE-2024-8176 / Expat 2.7.0 released, includes security fixes (20 points | 2 comments)
24. What are you doing this weekend? (7 points | 26 comments)
25. Is your Rails application special? (7 points | no comments)
